```{r}
data("trdel")
objnames <- c("CO", "TV", "PA", "AU", "CL")
mod.tr.ltype <- llbtPC.fit(trdel, nitems = 5, obj.names = objnames, 
                           formel = ~ ltype, elim = ~ ltype)
mod.tr.ltype
```

```{r}
w <- llbt.worth(mod.tr.ltype)
plot(w, log = "y")
```

```{r}
mod.tr <- llbtPC.fit(trdel, nitems = 5, obj.names = objnames)
mod.tr
```

```{r}
w <- llbt.worth(mod.tr)
plot(w, log = "y")
```

```{r}
pc.data <- read_csv(file.path("pc-data.csv"))
pc.data
```

```{r}
conditions <- c("CP", "VP", "FP", "CR", "VR", "FR", "BL")
mod.pc.data <- llbtPC.fit(pc.data, nitems = 7, obj.names = conditions)
mod.pc.data
```

```{r}
w <- llbt.worth(mod.pc.data)
colnames(w) <- c("Overall")
plot(w, log = "y", ylab = "Estimated Worth")
```
